:{{A|vo card navia ingame easy 03.ogg}} '''Navia:''' Oh, fudge!

;(When Navia defeats one of the player's Character Cards)

===Guest Challenge===
{{Dialogue Start}}
;(Talk to Navia)
:{{A|vo card navia freetalk 01.ogg}} '''Navia:''' I feel like I lose track of time as soon as I start playing cards... How about I make some desserts to keep us going?
:{{DIcon|TCG}} Let's play Genius Invokation TCG.
:;(Open Genius Invokation TCG match interface)
:{{DIcon}} I've got other things to do right now...
::{{A|vo card navia leave 01.ogg}} '''Navia:''' Are you leaving? I was just getting started... Hmm... I guess I'll play around with some other ways to build my deck.

;(If the player loses the match)
:{{A|vo card navia endofgame win 01.ogg}} '''Navia:''' Don't feel bad! I bet you're just a little light-headed from too much sunlight, you wouldn't have made those mistakes with a clear head! Here, fan yourself with my hat, cool down, and then we'll play another round.

;(If the player wins the match)
:{{A|vo card navia endofgame fail 01.ogg}} '''Navia:''' Phewee! Now that was fun! I can see why it's such a popular game. ...Hm? Oh, it's not about winning. All that matters to me is that I get to play with my partner!
{{Dialogue End}}
